Title: Beast-skewer Killbow
Legend: The idea of an orruk that can shoot straight seems like a contradiction, but they do exist - those who operate the portable ballistas known as Beast-skewer Killbows can not only bullseye a target but also slay several smaller enemies with a single shot.
Intro: A Beast-skewer Killbow is armed with Beast-skewer Bolts.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Middul Finga • Big Grikk’s Kruleshots

Rules.Name: Companion
Rules.Rule: COMPANION: This unit is accompanied by loading grots that are armed with Jaggedy Blades.

Rules.Name: Pick ’Em Off
Rules.Fluff: Boltboyz prefer to keep well away from the main battleline when possible, remaining stationary to fire carefully aimed shots at their enemies.
Rules.Rule: When this unit attacks with Beast-skewer Bolts, use the Aimed Shot missile weapon characteristics if it did not make a normal move in the same turn and is more than 3" from all enemy units. Otherwise, use the Hasty Shot missile weapon characteristics.

Rules.Name: Skewered
Rules.Fluff: Beast-skewer bolts can punch straight through a monster or several ranks of enemy warriors.
Rules.Rule: To determine the Damage characteristic for an attack made with Beast-skewer Bolts, roll a number of dice equal to the Wounds characteristic of the target unit. The Damage characteristic is equal to 2, plus 1 for each roll of 5+, up to a maximum Damage characteristic of 12.
